dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT DISTINCT s.source_location_gid, s.shipment_gid, TRIM(loc.location_name) orig_loc_name, loc.city orig_loc_city, loc.province_code orig_loc_prov, sref1.shipment_refnum_value commodity, (CASE WHEN (SELECT ifeat.item_feature_value FROM item_feature ifeat WHERE 'SCOULAR.' || sref1.shipment_refnum_value = ifeat.item_gid AND ifeat.item_feature_qual_gid = s.source_location_gid AND (NVL(ifeat.effective_date,SYSDATE) <= SYSDATE AND NVL(ifeat.expiration_date,SYSDATE) >= SYSDATE)) IS NULL THEN (SELECT ifeat.item_feature_value FROM item_feature ifeat WHERE 'SCOULAR.' || sref1.shipment_refnum_value = ifeat.item_gid AND NVL(SUBSTR(ifeat.item_feature_qual_gid,0,INSTR(ifeat.item_feature_qual_gid,'_')-1),ifeat.item_feature_qual_gid) = s.source_location_gid AND (NVL(ifeat.effective_date,SYSDATE) <= SYSDATE AND NVL(ifeat.expiration_date,SYSDATE) >= SYSDATE)) ELSE (SELECT ifeat.item_feature_value FROM item_feature ifeat WHERE 'SCOULAR.' || sref1.shipment_refnum_value = ifeat.item_gid AND ifeat.item_feature_qual_gid = s.source_location_gid AND (NVL(ifeat.effective_date,SYSDATE) <= SYSDATE AND NVL(ifeat.expiration_date,SYSDATE) >= SYSDATE)) END) blend, sref2.shipment_refnum_value packaging, sref3.shipment_refnum_value loc_code, s.total_net_weight_base, (SELECT SUM(sc.cost) FROM shipment_cost sc WHERE sc.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND sc.cost_type = 'B') scost_fr, (SELECT SUM(sc.cost) FROM shipment_cost sc WHERE sc.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND sc.cost_type = 'A' AND sc.accessorial_code_gid = 'SCOULAR/FOOD.FSC') scost_fu FROM shipment s INNER JOIN location loc ON s.source_location_gid = loc.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref1 ON s.shipment_gid = sref1.shipment_gid AND sref1.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.COMMODITY' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref2 ON s.shipment_gid = sref2.shipment_gid AND sref2.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.LTL PACKAGING DESCRIPTION' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref3 ON s.shipment_gid = sref3.shipment_gid AND sref3.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.LOC_CODE' WHERE s.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/FOOD' AND s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND (TO_DATE(s.insert_date,'dd-mm-rr') >= TO_DATE(:START_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(s.insert_date,'dd-mm-rr') <= TO_DATE(:END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')) order by s.shipment_gid
